item.title: The Road Towards an Open Database Performance Ranking
item.description: Watch This Talk Here The talk will be live-streamed on several platforms. No registration is required. Feel free to ask your questions in chat. Follow the links now and subscribe to notifications not to miss anything! YouTube LinkedIn Twitter @PerconaBytes Twitch PerconaCommunity Understanding the performance of different databases is crucial for building efficient, data-intensive applications. Benchmarking possible databases is a valid option for enabling such comparison, yet, it is a major challenge due to heterogeneity in the resource, database, and workload level.
